member.name: M:Serilog.Enrichers.Unity.LoggerEnrichmentConfigurationExtensions.WithUnityData(Serilog.Configuration.LoggerEnrichmentConfiguration,Serilog.Enrichers.Unity.UnityLogEnricherSettings)
member.summary: Enriches log events with context from the Unity engine such as frame counts, GameObject hierarchies, etc. For assets (e.g., s), this will simply be the . For scene objects, this will be the hierarchical path of the object using .
member.param: Supplies settings for generating the hierarchical path of scene objects.

member.name: F:Serilog.Enrichers.Unity.UnityLogEnricher.UnityContextKey
member.summary: Purposefully collides with the key used by Serilog.Sinks.Unity3D's UnityObjectEnricher. Ideally, that enricher (or an app-specific enricher) will add the Unity context object, then this enricher will use it to construct the context's "path".

member.name: P:Serilog.Enrichers.Unity.UnityLogEnricherSettings.AddHierarchicalName
member.summary: If , then every log is encriched with the hierarchy path of scene objects, if applicable. Use this to generate logs that more specifically identify a scene .

member.name: P:Serilog.Enrichers.Unity.UnityLogEnricherSettings.ParentCount
member.summary: If is then, for s that are scene objects, the name will include up to this many parent objects' names in the logs.

member.name: P:Serilog.Enrichers.Unity.UnityLogEnricherSettings.ParentNameSeparator
member.summary: If is then, for s that are scene objects, the name of the Object and its parents will be separated by this string.
